entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
